actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

official_title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that the overtime exemption available to employees engaged in the transportation and preparation of fruit and vegetables is available to employees engaged in the transportation and preparation of sugar beets.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to make the overtime exemption available to employees engaged in the transportation and preparation of fruit and vegetables expressly available to employees engaged in the transportation and preparation of sugar beets, including transportation from a place where such farm produce is temporarily stockpiled in conjunction with the harvest.

titles.title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that the overtime exemption available to employees engaged in the transportation and preparation of fruit and vegetables is available to employees engaged in the transportation and preparation of sugar beets.
